description: This file defines NotesAdapter, a RecyclerView adapter class that binds Note data objects to the user interface list items in an Android application. It manages view creation, data binding, and item click interactions for a list of notes.
external_files: R (resources, specifically layout and string resources)

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter that manages Note items and binds them to the list UI, supporting item updates and click events.

classes.name: NotesAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that holds references to note item views and binds Note data to them.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Replaces current items with new list and refreshes the list display.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and inflates a new ViewHolder for a list item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds Note data to the ViewHolder and sets an item click listener with animation.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of items in the list.

methods.name: VH.bind
methods.description: Populates the views within the list item with data from a Note object.

methods.name: VH.formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a human-readable date string.
